GAME THREAD: U of L football at Notre Dame

JonathanLintner LouisvillePosts: 450Administrator, Moderator, C-J Staffer admin
November 21 in University of Louisville
U of L can keep its Orange Bowl hopes alive on its first trip to Notre Dame. If you're going, post your photos. If not, sit back and enjoy it with the rest of us on TV.

We'll chat about the game before, during and after the final whistle. Predictions are always welcome.

The Courier-Journal's U of L page
